ActorTalk: There are quite a few interesting new facilities since they renovated the Commercial District.
It feels like it was only closed for a few days, but everything feels completely different now. Even the roads are much wider.
That was the Engineering Force. They are extremely efficient.
I saw someone on the terminal recommending all these interesting new shops that opened around the Orbital Corridor. Want to check them out later?
Alright, let's make it our next stop.
